sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/CheckOut.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap' import Helmet from '../components/Helmet/Helmet' import CommonSection from '../components/Ui/CommonSection' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { CartActions } from '../redux/Slice/CartSlice' const Checkout = () => { const totalQty = useSelector(state => state.cart.totalQuantity) const totalAmount = useSelector(state => state.cart.totalAmount) return (
Billing Info
Total Amount Of Items : {totalQty} items
Total Amount Of Price : ${totalAmount}

Total Cost : ${totalAmount}
) } export default Checkout
